text.tspan: CBOW can be seen as a continuous state transition model

flowRoot.flowPara: Summing the continuous effect (e0+e1) is same as aggregating the continuous state differences (= s2-s0)

text.tspan: The basic assumption of the CBOW model:
What is "meaning"? = the effect onto the mental state caused by listening/reading the word
"the meaning of the bag of the context words" is close to "the meaning of the target word".
